â€œTilray patient review:
Watermelon smell/flavour definitely there.
The euphoria in this strain is intense for an indica. It is uplifting and energizing. I don't feel sleepy and I can do a variety of activities and not feel couch locked. I prefer to use it during the day, not the evening.
I don't really notice the typical indica body effects until the euphoria fully sets in. Once it does it provides me with moderate pa...â€

â€œWatermelon is one of my favorite strains for regular use, as it does not impair coordination or cognitive skills.  I highly recommend this for a daytime or nighttime smoke, and as a way to enhance boring physical activity  (i.e. this is great for cardio exercise, doing laundry, vacuuming the house).   The Watermelon experience is also very social, as you'll feel very relaxed and patient if you are around people, so d...â€

â€œThis strain did wonders for my depression! I was having a hard time not too long ago and was struggling with suicidal thoughts. None of the antidepressants I was trying were helping. This strain had me feeling genuinely happy- I was actually laughing and feeling SOME form of hope. It honestly saved my life until I could find an antidepressant that worked for meâ€

â€œThis is a very unique flower that begins its introduction with a full array of crystals, color and rich smell ending with fruity flavor. The flowers are firm and full. The smell has a light, sweet fruity aroma fallowed by a complimenting crisp watermelon scent. When smoking through a pipe the juicy fruity flavor hits right away. Upon exhale, the crisp smooth watermelon flavor kicks in. When using a bong the experienc...â€

â€œWatermelon is one of my favorite strains for regular use, as it does not impair coordination or cognitive skills.  I highly recommend this for a daytime or nighttime smoke, and as a way to enhance some boring physical activity  (i.e. this is great for cardio exercise, doing laundry, vacuuming the house).   The Watermelon experience is also very social, as you'll feel very relaxed and patient if you are around people....â€

â€œThis review is for Nameless Genetics' strain watermelon, which may be different than the Indica version listed here on Leafly. It's more often labeled as a sativa-dominant hybrid 'round these parts, but then, you can't really trust most dispensaries' menus (but that's drama for another time and place).

So here's the dilly. I scored this medicine from Green Wolf in LA, having heard great things about Nameless's work,...â€

â€œStrain: Watermelon OG (Unknown for certain -- Indica)
THC: 21.67%
CBD: 0.00%
Grower: LTRMN
Location found: KaLeafa
Date purchased: 3.31.16
Price: $7.00/g
Weight: 1.2g
Method of Consumption: Herb Iron and small bong 
Smell: A light and airy citrus grape with the tiniest amount of Kush in the backdrop.
Look: Tiny darker nugs, orange hairs, crystally coated and probably greenhouse. Trimmed well for small nugs.
Taste: Th...â€

â€œPotent indica-dominant hybrid. I'm giving this strain 5 stars for doing what it is supposed to do; made me hungry then made me sleepy. The terpene profile is incredible, I'm amazed it tastes like watermelon.â€
â€œA great indica that isn't too overpowering. Relaxing effect, took away my stress from work and chilled me out. A nice nighttime smoke but I feel I could use this midday-evening to relax.â€

â€œHands down my favourite bud. Specifically the Astroboy cutting that is oh-so-delicious. Delicate flower, certainly has a strong indica footing but a certain Sativa glitter to the high. Very focused and creative high, long lasting with a warm glow to the entire trip. Very flavourful, sweet, fruity taste that lingers well after you are done smoking.â€

â€œI love love love this strain. I get easy paranoia from most all indicas. But I smoked this last night with my husband, and we sat relaxed for a good 90 minutes watching blue planet laughing at the hilarious birds mating dances. I could still get up and move around without being too gone. This also relaxes me completely. I suffer terrible anxiety and stress, this strain puts it to sleep. I slowly get sleepy so I this ...â€

â€œLevi's Watermelon from the healing canna in Colorado Springs is a 5 out 5 Indica . from terpenes . taste . smell texture . quality . high . power full . very Fruity Indica . once again very very Fruity . I love this strain . can't get enough . just bought some to celebrate my bday this weekend how much I love watermelon . a rare new find treatâ€

â€œIt's absolutely an amazing indica, only 15 minutes into the session and I'm experiencing extreme euphoria and numbness around the body, just really relaxed vibrations. Plus it's an almost genius combination of indica and sativa (80/20) and what little cerebral effects are there gently compliment the intense wave of the body high.â€

â€œThis is a very exciting strain for me.  I have a number of problems, including chronic pain and anxiety, and for several years have not been able to sleep without taking xanax - until I tried Watermelon, that is.  It relaxed my body and soothed my pain; it relaxed my mind and soothed my nerves.  I drifted comfortably off to sleep and woke up BEFORE MY ALARMS, (I set 3 alarms to wake me up, since that's what it usuall...â€

â€œNot your typical indica! Releases you from the burden of your consciousness with out couch lock â€” the occasional sense of grogginess came about a few times (like I just woke up from a nap). This is a good strain for when you need a break but you donâ€™t want to feel tired or go to sleep. Watermelon flavour is pretty accurate but a bit of pungent flavours too. Not a good strain to be occupied with, you will get frustrat...â€
â€œI had the concentrate of this and vaped it. Sweet Taste, with different aftertaste. Smooth hit. THC: 83% CBD: 2%â€
â€œDefenetly my fav strain! Tip for bong: Use it with ice cold apple use instead of water ğŸ‘Œ believe me you'll thank me later! ğŸ¤˜â€
â€œI don't see this strain enough. For an indica it provides an immediate euphoric high that enhances any experience.â€

â€œExtremely pungent aroma consisting of citrus, sweet, skunk and fruit. The smell fills an entire room immediately. Unique aroma for an indica to say the least. The body high is very grounding, takes awhile to settle in. A stress relieving head high is first felt which can easily bring on munchies. Great for relaxing, appetite, sleep and stress reliefâ€

â€œI'm not a huge fun of Blueberry or Lemon but omg I couldn't believe it when I got this watermelon it literally smell like a watermelon especially when you chop it up however it does not when you blow it out! Still I can see why this is one of the fastest most popular growing strains on the market right now! Now they just have to cross it with a crush make watermelon Kush I'd buy that any day of the week!â€

â€œThis is a really strong indica that would make you feel like jelly. Definitely best to smoke at nighttime, and while it will relax your mind and body, you will have the energy to be social, and also carry on otherwise mundane tasks. I do have some difficulty focusing on complicated tasks tough using this!â€

â€œI been smokin'........... Watermelon
-BeyoncÃ©â€

â€œWhenever I see my local dispensary selling this strain, I make sure to get some! It is so amazing, and I love how relaxed and chill I feel. I also helps with my nausea more than some other Indicas. It's definitely a hard hitter, but it's perfect when you're usually an energetic person and are being forced to relax for your medical rest.â€
â€œDefenetly my fav strain! Tip for bong: Use it with ice cold apple use instead of water ğŸ‘Œ believe me you'll thank me later! ğŸ¤˜â€

â€œIt's a much more leafy soft strain with a flowery taste and minimal odour. Made me hungry almost instantly, and also relaxed. The watermelon aroma is nice but overall it's a standard indica. Didn't make me sleepy.â€

Now they just have to cross it with a crush make watermelon Kush I'd buy that any day of the week!â€

â€œReally loose fluffy nugs with a definite sweet smell to them. A bit more of a sour smell when it's ground up. Tastes nice, obvious hybrid effects: a tad squinty, a little lazy, nice and mellow. Wouldn't use for sleep, though. Definitely a nice strain, just not a huge hybrid fan.â€
â€œreally taste sweet & good buzzâ€
â€œgreat taste, like watermelon... Very relaxed high that I would enjoy as recreational or anti stressâ€

â€œVaping it & the taste is harsh in my throat,
but I just had surgery on my back & having pain & muscle spasms this took the pain completely away & put me to a nice slumber!! Itâ€™s a mellow happy kick back high & slaps pain in the face!!â€

â€œNIRVANA. Is the first word that comes to my mind when i smoked this for the first time, this just might be my favorite indica. Itâ€™s actually incredible how it literally taste like watermelon. The euphoria is soooo amazing!!! It makes me genuinely content with myself and my surroundings, eliminating any anxiety or negative outlooks on life, managing to hold a conversation, itâ€™s truly remarkable. This is daily medicine...â€
â€œamazing and fruity, with a great taste, watermelon is a nice discovery.  Very good body high, and good narcotic effect make it a nice sleep aid or pain reliever.â€

â€œThis is one of my favourites! WATERMELON! You can smell the melon the second you open the bag. It allows you still get your day to day done while feeling like your having Fun In The Sun! 

From the boys @ LongLeaf Bluntsâ€

â€œGood strain. dense buds, nice smell, super fruity. I'd recommend this to anyone who has trouble sleeping. put me to sleep. NOT a good strain if you want to get work done. Obviously because its an indica.â€

â€œLove It !!
For chronic pain through my shoulder and neck this strain does the trick !
Great taste from start to finish.
This is one of my favorite night time meds. Potent enough to kill the pain but also allows me to be engaging yet relaxed without being couch locked !â€
â€œmore like sativaâ€

â€œA truly essential indica that I would recommend to anyone wanting the well known indica punch with more subtle bursts of creativity and sometimes hunger. good clean smoke. very light ash and a incredibly pronounced fruit bouquet on the nose and a very earthy, almost tropical taste. fresh and subtle with its demeanor it's a perfect strain for Sunday nights alone or a movie night with friends.â€

â€œgreat terps, sweet and mouthwatering, just like the melon.
Strong onset, mild finish.â€

Would recommend for people who have trouble sleeping.â€
â€œGood to chill with your friends in a blaze session, I'm not sure if anyone else found this, but the bud when rolled in a joint actually tastes like watermelon!â€

130pm

230pm

â€œWhile Leafly lists this as 80% indica, mine was labeled as a hybrid and feels more like a 50/50 hybrid to me. I'm vaping Select Strain's Watermelon in concentrate form, and it tested at 81% THC and .59% CBD.

â€œVery good taste and nice colourâ€

â€œIndicas tend to make me paranoid - this one? Not so much. However, the delicious taste is captivating, leading me to smoke more than I should! Fruity and grape-like. I felt calm, relaxed, mind melded, and locked in couch catching up on my shows.â€
â€œGreat strain for pain and to unwind after work. Won't hit you hard, but will remind you its am indica at times.â€

good body relaxation for sure. tasty smoke.â€

â€œWatermelon has a noticeably fruity smell, the berry profiles seem to be blueberry and strawberry, although I could be mistaken. Using a pipe will ensure the full terpene experience. Extremely powerful strain. I was quite groggy the nex...â€

â€œOnly reason I gave 4 stars is because this strain made me waaaaaaay too sleepy! But that being said, I used it to wake and bake so that was my bad. If you can't sleep, smoke some watermelon and I promise you, sleep will come!
